column1: Uchi////Servings are admittedly small but the quality is incredible
column2: and each bite is a complete experience. I walked in expecting to spend at least $400 (my husband can EAT) and couldn't believe it when the check showed up and
column6: and maybe 3-4 small bottles of hot sake
column7: the damage was only $290. Needless to say

column9: and he returned the love with a complimentary seasonal dessert and a $25 gift card for our next visit!
